channel.title: [508]Equipment stats don't update when item equip
channel.description:
This is in DavidScapes V7.0 Source.
I'm having a bit of trouble having the bonuses automatically update when I equip a new item.
For example, I put on a dragon scimitar, the bonuses in the equipment stats don't update until I reopen it.
Does anyone know where I can find out how to fix this?

item.title: [508]Equipment stats don't update when item equip
item.dc:creator: @iceman327 iceman327
